name: Binary Eclipse
description:
Made in a week for Dungeon Crawler Jam 2023, with the theme Duality.

WASD moves, Mouse to navigate menus (attacks, rest, level, etc)

Can you make it past floor 7?

Code, graphics and audio by Forrest Trahan (zez5)

Using 

Font: "Seven OS" by Mathews Walden, from Pixel Font Pack on GDM.

Some default UI stuff from Unity

Sample normal map from filterforge

Everything else hand made by me.
